attributes.action: Remove mandatory hotel quarantine for fully vaccinated as US Canada & Ireland
attributes.additional_details: To help British citizens continue their work in Emergency frontline and also help Business.
attributes.background: Change rule of mandatory hotel quarantine for fully vaccinated individual if they are PCR negative as recently US CANADA AND IRELAND have done as per CDC guidance

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Scrap quarantine for vaccinated people arriving in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575612

No quarantine in the UK if you present a COVID-19 PCR test or you are vaccinated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586691
